topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54a222a86368720bcd200000#post_54a222a86368720bcd200000
[bq="Whatevs"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54a21f5a6368724f15120000#post_54a21f5a6368724f15120000
Well I think the issue of low birth rates is what draws ire, but at the same time I think blaming otaku is myopic[/bq]
The problem with the low birth rates has to do with their economic stagnation.  I don't think anyone would argue against the notion that a country is economic stagnation, recession, depression or such has lower birth rates because less people have children during times of economic stagnation.  I totally agree with you about how blaming otakus is nearsighted cause they're spending all that time blaming otakus instead of trying to boost the economy.  Imagine if during the housing crash instead of all the governments trying to recover the economies they instead spent all their time blaming say gamers for the housing crash and then whenever them shaming gamers didn't work rather than admit they were wrong spent even more time shaming gamers thinking that if they shamed gamers hard enough it would recover the economy.

Eventually Japan will bounce back, but we're not talking for another decade cause the people currently in power are kind of stupid.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
My Internet is weird.

I'm downloading something worth 2Gb and the Kb/s keeps changing like haywire.

It goes from zero, 15 Kb/s, 65 Kb/s, 100 Kb/s (these are pretty normal) and then 300 Kb/s, 400 Kb/s and then back to zero.
